commentBody: Hi everyone! I just arrived at the meeting point. Anyone else here yet?
I'm running about 10 minutes late due to traffic. Please wait for me!
Just a reminder that we should all bring our own water bottles and sunscreen for today.
The view from the north trail is incredible right now! Everyone should head this way.
Does anyone have an extra power bank? Mine just died and I need to keep my phone charged for photos.
